title: Church Complaints, Granny Bride, Spelling Bee, Richard Branson and more.
itunes:title: Church Complaints, Granny Bride, Spelling Bee, Richard Branson and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Steve drops a gem in our lap to start the day,. The CLO tells a woman to part, straight up! Apparently Pastor Motown anointed someone with the wrong oil and the people want answers. The champ is here! Big ups to Harvey, LA. Fool #2 gives us the 911 calls made on 4th of July. Milwaukee wins the latest to make it 2-1 with PHX leading the series. What the H is space tourism? Martha Mae Ophelia Moon Tucker is living her dream. The comedians give you the things people whisper in church. Steve shouts out his friend. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve explains the importance of faith and defines success.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
